data.mode: Forecast mode for the Weather entity
data.name: Integration Name
data.units: Units for sensors. Not used unless sperate sensors are needed
data.forecast: Daily forecasts sensors in csv form from 0-7 (ex. '0,1,3'). Only use if seperate sensors are needed!
data.hourly_forecast: Hourly forecast sensors in csv form from 0-47 (ex. '0,1,10'). Only use if seperate sensors are needed!
data.monitored_conditions: Monitored conditions. Only use if seperate sensors are needed!
data.pw_platform: Weather Entity and/or Sensor Entity. Selecting Sensor will create seperate entities for each condition at each time! If unsure, only select Weather!
data.pw_round: Round values to the nearest integer. Ensure that the selected units match the system units.
